RedCarpet. Delhi, India. multiple positions. Full time/consulting

http://www.redcarpetup.com/jobs

We are data driven lending for the underbanked in India. We are building something around disrupting an entire chunk of banking and credit in India.

We are NOT a payments company. We combine data science and a whatsapp like experience on the mobile to build a credit experience that is easy to use.. and yet manage a very sophisticated lending and recon pipeline. We are looking to hire

1) top notch UX designers (fulltime or consulting)

2) python/celery/rq hackers

3) android devs.

my email is my profile. or apply directly at http://www.redcarpetup.com/jobs
